<!-- Beginner issue: very small content edit -->
# Beginner: Fix a short typo in `README.md`

Description
--
Find and fix any small grammatical typo or awkward sentence in the `README.md` file (for example, wording in the event description or a missing punctuation). This is intended as a one-line change suitable for first-time contributors.

Acceptance criteria
--
- A single-line edit to `README.md` is committed on a new branch.
- Preview the change locally or view the diff in the PR to confirm the fix.

Notes
--
- Create a branch named `fix/beginner-typo` and open a PR referencing this issue.
